Invocations for visiting the sick.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Never mind, may it (the sickness) be a purification, if Allah wills.)

Invocations for visiting the sick.ARABIC_TEXT: ((أَسْأَلُ اللَّهَ الْعَظيمَ رَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ أَنْ يَشْفيَكَ)) (سبع مرات).
Invocations for visiting the sick.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (I ask Allah The Supreme, Lord of the magnificent throne to cure you’.(7times) (he (the sick person) will be cured.))
